languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: мануфакторум игнорирует все исходящие от нас запросы и продолжает отправлять свои. Чем дольше мы не принимаем их сообщения, тем сильнее и настойчивее входящие сигналы. Я... никогда подобного не видела".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: мануфакторум игнорирует все исходящие от нас запросы и продолжает отправлять свои. Чем дольше мы не принимаем их сообщения, тем сильнее и настойчивее входящие сигналы. Я... никогда подобного не видела".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю: мануфакторум игнорирует все исходящие от нас запросы и продолжает отправлять свои. Чем дольше мы не принимаем их сообщения, тем сильнее и настойчивее входящие сигналы. Я... никогда подобного не видела".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals get. I've... Never seen anything similar."

"Lord Captain, reporting: manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals get. I've... Never seen anything similar."

"Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

"Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

"Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

languages.text: “报告，舰长大人，制造工厂忽视了我们所有的请求，继续向我们发送他们的请求。我们越是忽视他们的请求，他们传过来的信号就越强、越持久。我……以前从来没遇到过这种情况。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

traits.locale_text: “报告，舰长大人，制造工厂忽视了我们所有的请求，继续向我们发送他们的请求。我们越是忽视他们的请求，他们传过来的信号就越强、越持久。我……以前从来没遇到过这种情况。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le informo: el manufactorum ignora todas nuestras solicitudes y sigue enviando las suyas propias. Cuanto más tardamos en aceptar sus mensajes, más fuertes y persistentes son las señales entrantes. No... Nunca había visto nada parecido».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le informo: el manufactorum ignora todas nuestras solicitudes y sigue enviando las suyas propias. Cuanto más tardamos en aceptar sus mensajes, más fuertes y persistentes son las señales entrantes. No... Nunca había visto nada parecido».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich melde: Das Manufactorum ignoriert alle unsere Anfragen und sendet uns weiterhin seine eigenen. Je länger wir ihre Nachrichten nicht akzeptieren, desto stärker und anhaltender werden die eingehenden Signale. So etwas habe ich ... noch nie gesehen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

languages.text: « Au rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Le manufactorum ignore toutes nos transmissions et continue à nous adresser ses requêtes. Ces messages ne cessent d'augmenter en nombre et en intensité. Je... Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

traits.locale_text: « Au rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Le manufactorum ignore toutes nos transmissions et continue à nous adresser ses requêtes. Ces messages ne cessent d'augmenter en nombre et en intensité. Je... Je n'ai jamais rien vu de tel. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告です。聖工場はこちらのリクエストを全て無視し、向こうのリクエストを立て続けに送信しています。メッセージを受け入れない時間が長引くほど、受信信号はどんどん強くなって終わりが見えません。こんなことは…初めてです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告です。聖工場はこちらのリクエストを全て無視し、向こうのリクエストを立て続けに送信しています。メッセージを受け入れない時間が長引くほど、受信信号はどんどん強くなって終わりが見えません。こんなことは…初めてです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, rapor veriyorum: Manufaktorum, tüm taleplerimizi görmezden gelip kendisi talep göndermeyi sürdürüyor. Mesajlarını kabul etmemeyi sürdürdükçe sinyaller daha güçlü ve daha ısrarcı hâle geliyor. Ben... Daha önce böyle bir şey görmedim."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, reporting: the manufactorum is ignoring all our requests and continues to send us its own. The longer we do not accept their messages, the stronger and more persistent the incoming signals become. I've... never seen anything like."
